nrccMessages.message: The lifts are out of order between platforms 1 and 2 at the east end of the station and the subway at Cardiff Central.
Storm Éowyn is affecting some Transport for Wales routes today. More information can be found in Status and Disruptions.

Storm Éowyn is affecting CrossCountry services today: do not travel between York / Newcastle and Edinburgh. Please check your journey before travel. Latest information can be found in Status and Disruptions.
The lifts are out of order between platforms 6 and 7 and the walkway at Cardiff Central station.
